org.universAAL.middleware.container.osgi.util
Class BundleConfigHome

java.lang.Object
  org.universAAL.middleware.container.osgi.util.BundleConfigHome
Direct Known Subclasses:
Messages
public class BundleConfigHome
extends java.lang.Object

The base class for configuration files in universAAL. All configuration files are contained in the root directory of the universAAL runtime (rundir). The configuration files of a bundle are contained in a subdirectory with the name of that bundle (Best Practice).

Author:
climberg, Carsten Stockloew

Constructor Detail

BundleConfigHome

public BundleConfigHome(java.lang.String id)
Constructor the create a new object for accessing configuration files.

Parameters:
id - The ID for the configuration file. The actual file name consists of the root directory of the universAAL runtime, the given ID (which is by Best Practice the bundle name), and a file name which is given to the methods getConfFileAsStream(File) or getConfFileAsStream(String).
